result.description: Processor to notify subscribers that an email that should be displayed in an activity stream has been processed by the system.  Payload will be empty, this is simply a notification.  It will be up to the subscriber to request new activity.  This channel is intended for use ONLY by Activity Stream v0 clients.  Activity Stream v1 clients will receive notifications on the /activity/events/** channel.
